title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: Clearly define the requirements for the WorkplaceErgonomicsAdvisor system. This includes: specifying the types of ergonomic recommendations to be provided, outlining user interface design principles and functionality, identifying data sources for ergonomic guidelines and best practices, determining target platforms (web, mobile, etc.), considering any specific constraints or regulations, and establishing accessibility standards. Additionally, provide a detailed system architecture design, including frontend, backend, and database components, along with any necessary APIs and integrations. Clearly define the data model and interaction between different system components. Specify security measures to protect user data. Lastly, establish a plan for testing and validation of the system.

title: Design System Architecture for WorkplaceErgonomicsAdvisor
description: Design the overall architecture of the WorkplaceErgonomicsAdvisor system, including the components, data flow, integration points, and key considerations for maintainability, scalability, and performance. The design should aim to minimize latency, maximize throughput, and ensure seamless user interaction. Additionally, the design should be flexible enough to accommodate future improvements and expansions, with emphasis on a microservices-based architecture, cloud deployment, and containerization for scalability and resilience. Incorporate security best practices throughout the system, especially in data handling and storage.

title: Develop Ergonomic Recommendation Engine
description: Implement the AI algorithm(s) responsible for generating personalized ergonomic recommendations based on user input and data.

title: Design and Implement User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the WorkplaceErgonomicsAdvisor system, including the web and/or mobile interfaces.

title: Set up Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management components for the system, including user data, ergonomic recommendations, and any other relevant data.

title: Implement Security and Privacy Measures
description: Ensure the system adheres to security and privacy best practices, including user data protection, secure communication, and access controls.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the WorkplaceErgonomicsAdvisor system, including automated testing, building, and deployment processes.

title: Develop Testing Strategy and Plan
description: Create a comprehensive testing strategy and plan for the WorkplaceErgonomicsAdvisor system. This includes unit tests, integration tests, end-to-end tests, and performance tests to ensure robustness, scalability, and efficiency of the AI system. The test plan should also include testing for various edge cases, error handling scenarios, and user experience considerations. Consider using a combination of manual and automated testing methods. Additionally, ensure that accessibility standards are met throughout the testing process.

title: Create Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and user guides for the WorkplaceErgonomicsAdvisor system, including installation instructions, user manuals, and API documentation.
